translations: v.支撑；支持（prop 的现在分词）；搁

sentences.sentence: One theoretician propping up another theoretician—this is a mutual admiration society.
sentences.translation: 一个理论家可以去认可另一位——这是个彼此仰慕的社会。

sentences.sentence: In January of last year the Moviemania chain of movie theaters started propping its popcorn in canola oil, instead of the less healthful coconut oil that it had been using until then.
sentences.translation: 去年1月，Moviemania 连锁影院开始用菜籽油代替之前一直使用的不太健康的椰子油来制作爆米花。

sentences.sentence: I needed some steadying and some propping-up myself.
sentences.translation: 我自己也需要一些稳定和一些依靠。
